casebody.data:
Robert TEIXEIRA
v.
The HOME DEPOT, INC. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 6, 2018

The plaintiffs petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn.App. 594, 164 A.3d 836 (2018), is dismissed.

MULLINS, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
